Plot: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.
Title: Slackers
Actors: Devon Sawa, Jason Segel, Michael C. Maronna, Jason Schwartzman
tomatoConsensus: Another teen comedy with little on its mind but moving to the next gross-out gag, Slackers strains for laughs and features grating characters.
